name: fitness-app-overview
content:
Fitness App Overview:
- Korean language fitness tracking app
- 5 main sections: 홈 (Home), 기록 (Records), 통계 (Statistics), 소셜 (Social), 메뉴 (Menu)
- Core features: Workout tracking, AI programs, progress photos, body metrics, social feed, rankings
- User: dan914 (Diamond tier)
- Database center: User entity connects all features organically

name: features-documentation
content:
Created comprehensive FEATURES.md documenting all fitness app features including:
- Home: Dashboard, workout tracking, exercise details, AI programs
- Records: Calendar views, workout history, progress photos, body metrics
- Statistics: Muscle group analysis, volume tracking, performance graphs
- Social: Feed, interactions, content creation, cardio integration
- Menu: Profile, calculators, rankings, settings, data management
File saved at: /mnt/c/Users/danny/.vscode/new finess app/documentation/FEATURES.md

name: navigation-documentation
content:
Created NAVIGATION_FLOW.md documenting:
- Primary bottom tab navigation structure
- Complete screen-to-screen flow mappings
- Modal and overlay patterns
- Navigation gestures (swipe, pull)
- Deep linking URL scheme
- Navigation state management
- Error states and redirects

name: database-schema-documentation
content:
Created comprehensive DATABASE_SCHEMA.md with:
- 20 interconnected tables with User as central hub
- Complete SQL CREATE statements with proper constraints
- Foreign key relationships ensuring organic connections
- Indexes for performance optimization
- Data integrity rules with cascading deletes
- Social features (posts, likes, comments, follows)
- Workout tracking (exercises, sets, programs)
- Body metrics and progress photos
- Gamification (achievements, rankings)
- Settings and notifications
File saved at: /mnt/c/Users/danny/.vscode/new finess app/documentation/DATABASE_SCHEMA.md
